name: Key Of Life
description:
Mysterious survivor of your race, the player solves a suite of puzzles to unlock new zones and get more details about what happened to his people. With only environmental storytelling and hints to the past civilization's culture and downfalls, this leaves a large amount of the story up to the player to try and piece together and figure out. 

The game features puzzles that the players can interact with. The core mechanics are walking, gliding, picking up orbs and pressure pad.
